page.title: 02WITLEY PARK FARM ESTATE
page.content: { Witley Park}has eight buildings,five of them are lived in.Sir Raymond Brown who owns the park lives in Pine Lodge with his family.The keeper lives in Lake Lodge,the gardener lives in Brook Lodge,the chauffeur lives in Thursley Lodge and a farm worker lives in Milford Lodge.There are three lakes - Stable Lake,Thursley Lake and Spring Lake.Under one of the lakes there is an{underwater ballroom.}This was built in 1896.You are able to bathe in Stable Lake.There are quite a few items of interest on the estate.They include boat houses,numerous statues, a bathing pavilion,water fountains,an ornamental wishing well,a copper roofed dove cote and a polo ground. From 16th June until the end of September,private fishing clubs use the Thursley and Stable lakes on Wednesdays and Sundays for sport.
